attributes.action: seriously look at and reconsider the Gurkha settlement plan which was announced today, the 24 April 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These men chose to join the Gurkhas and to fight for their adopted Queen and Country.

The British Governments of the day have sent them all over the world to war zones.  They have went without complaint where some have paid the ultimate sacrifice while others have been maimed.

After fighting for Queen and Country they are treated worse than migrant workers arriving in the UK on a daily basis.

It is a deplorable and despicable way in which to treat these men and their families.

Gordon Brown should stand up and be counted.  He should be man enough to review this decision as soon as possible and put it right.
